ComicInfo.Summary: The Witchblade is trying to kill Sara's partner, Eric, and it takes all of her willpower to get it under control. Sara learns that Julie has a new job at an internet peep show which she seems very happy with. Sara and Eric attend Anya's funeral and, when Irons gets up to give a eulogy, the Witchblade invades Sara's mind with thoughts of destruction and violence.
ComicInfo.Tags: New York State,Kenneth Irons,Jake McCarthy,Ian Nottingham,Shine,New York City,Julie Pezzini,Gavin Taylor,Witchblade,Eric Sketh,Sara Pezzini,Doctor Nolin,Level 42
